short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easiest way to save gas fees

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: GasHawk is a free to use tool to help you save on Ethereum gas fees by intelligently submitting your transaction when gas fees are cheap. The average cost savings are 25 - 30%.
